name: 陳貞光
objective: 綱 介紹熱力學三大定律，將熱力學定律應用於計算凝結相之化學位能與其平衡，逸壓和活性因素，溶液熱力學，多元金屬溶液，相圖和相變化，運用電腦模擬相反應和相圖，及研擬冶金數學模式。
schedule:
w1- Introduction to Thermodynamics - Chap.1
w2- First Law of Thermodynamics - Chap.2
w3/4- Second Law of Thermodynamics - Chap.3
w5- Statistical Interpretation of Entropy - Chap.4
w6/7- Auxiliary Functions - Chap.5
w8- Third Law of Thermodynamis - Chap.6
w9- Midterm Exam
w10/11- Phase Equilibrium in One-component System - Chap.7
w12- Behavior of Gases - Chap.8
w13/14- Behavior of Solutions - Chap.9
w15/16- Gibbs Free Energy Composition and Phase Diagrams - Chap.10
w17- Reactions Involving Pure Condensed Phases and a Gaseous Phase - Chap.12
w18- Final Exam.
scorePolicy: 30% Midterm, 30% Final Exam, 40% Class performance and Assignment
materials:
Textbook: Introduction to the Thermodynamics of Materials, 4th Ed., by David R. Gaskell, Taylor & Francis, c.2003.
中文參考書：材料熱力學，編譯：蔡希杰，偉明圖書，c.2003.
原著：David R. Gaskell, 3rd Ed.
